{{Wireless embedded system |brand=ZyXEL |model=NBG6816 |revision=(Armor Z1) |asin=B00W7BFNN4 |series=AC2350 |fcc_date=06/26/2015 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf=MitraStar |availability=now |type=wireless router |fcc_id=I88NBG6816 |ic_id=2468C-NBG6816 |pcb_id=45-601-000573 |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=4 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Qualcomm |cpu1_model=IPQ8064 |cpu1_cspeed=1.4 GHz |cpu1_cores=2 |cpu2_brand=Quantenna |cpu2_model=QT3840BC |cpu2_cspeed=500 |cpu2_cores=2 |fla1=4 GiB |fla1_brand=Toshiba |fla1_model=eMMC |fla2=16 |fla2_brand=Macronix |fla2_model=MX25L12835FM2I-10G |fla3=128 |fla3_brand=Spansion |fla3_model=SPI <!-- 128 MiB Spansion SPI ? --> |ram1=512 |ram1_brand=Micron |ram1_model=MT41K128M16JT-125:K |ram1_num=2 |ram2=128 |ram2_brand=Winbond |ram2_model=W631GG6KB-12I |expansion_if_types=USB 3.0 |expansion_usb_num=2 |jtag=yes,, 20-pin header |serial=yes |wi1_chip1_brand=Quantenna |wi1_chip1_model=QT3840BC |wi1_chip2_brand=Quantenna |wi1_chip2_model=QT2518B |wi1_802dot11_protocols=an+ac |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL, RP-SMA |wi1_txchains=4 |wi1_rxchains=4 |wi1_sstreams=4 |wi2_chip1_brand=Qualcomm Atheros |wi2_chip1_model=QCA9880 |wi2_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi2_ant_conn=U.FL, RP-SMA |wi2_txchains=3 |wi2_rxchains=3 |wi2_sstreams=3 |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu= |sw_brand=Qualcomm Atheros |sw_model=QCA8337;QCA8337-AL3C, E53645.4C, 1350, KOREA; |lan_speed=1GbE |lan_ports=4 |wan_speed=1GbE |wan_ports=1 |addl_chips= |flags= |stock_boot= |stock_os= |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac |default_ssid=ZyXEL002240 |default_ssid_regex= |default_ip=192.168.1.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=1234 |oui=0C:4C:39 |oui_eth=0C:4C:39 }} {{TagLine|AC2350 Wireless Dual-Band Ultra HD Media Router}} :''ARMOR Z1 - AC2350 Dual-Band Wireless Gigabit Router'' :[http://www.zyxel.com/us/en/products_services/armor_z1.shtml?t=p Product page]
*Product Name: ARMOR Z1 *Model Number: NBG6816
"45-601-000573" is silkscreened on the board in the [https://fccid.io/document.php?id=2658762 FCC photos]. :OUI: 0C:4C:39 ([[MitraStar]] Technology Corp.) - [https://fccid.io/document.php?id=2658761 FCC label]
{{See also|ZyXEL NBG6815|ZyXEL NBG6817|MitraStar}}
===System Specifications=== *Wireless Standard: 802.11bgn (2.4GHz), 802.11an/ac (5GHz) *Wireless Speed: 600Mbps (2.4GHz), 1733Mbps (5GHz) *Wireless Security: WPA/WPA2, WPA-PSK/WPA2-PSK *Wireless Features: Guest Wi-Fi, WPS, WMM *Auto WAN type detection: Static IP, DHCP, PPPoE *Operation Mode: Router, Access Point
===Hardware Specifications=== *CPU: [[Qualcomm]] @1.4GHz Dual-core Processor *Memory: 512MB RAM (DDR3) and 4GB (eMMC) flash *Ports: 1x WAN GbE, 4x LAN GbE, 2x USB 3.0 ports *Antenna: 4x Dual-band high power external antennas *Buttons: Wireless on/off, Power on/off, WPS, Reset *Power: DC 12V/4A; Power Consumption: 29W max.
===Reviews=== * [http://www.smallnetbuilder.com/wireless/wireless-reviews/32535-linksys-e8350-ac2400-dual-band-gigabit-wi-fi-router-reviewed On '''SmallNetBuilder'''] ([[Linksys E8350]]) * [https://openitforum.pl/index/recenzje/routery/pozostale/zyxel-armor-z1-r258/ On '''OpenIT''' forums]
===Models=== :;[[ZyXEL]] • [https://www.zyxel.com/products_services/home-home_routers.shtml Home Routers] *[[ZyXEL WAP6806 (Armor X1)]] - AC2100 Dual-Band Wireless Gigabit Access Point :• FCC ID: I88WAP6806 (2016-05-31) • [https://www.zyxel.com/products_services/AC2100-Dual-Band-Wireless-Gigabit-Access-Point-Range-Extender-ARMOR-X1/ PPage] (Access Point/Range Extender) *[[ZyXEL WAP6906 (Armor X2)]] - AC3800 Tri-Band WiFi Repeater/Range Extender :• FCC ID: I88WAP6906 (2018-03-14) • [https://www.zyxel.com/products_services/AC2600-Multi-Gigabit-WiFi-Router-ARMOR-G1/ PPage] *[[ZyXEL NBG6815]] ([https://www.zyxel.com/products_services/AC2200-MU-MIMO-Dual-Band-Wireless-Gigabit-Router-NBG6815/ Armor Y?]) - AC2200 Dual-Band Wireless Gigabit Router :• FCC ID: I88NBG6815 (2015-11-30) *[[ZyXEL NBG6816 (Armor Z1)]] - AC2350 Dual-Band Wireless Gigabit Router :• FCC ID: I88NBG6816 (2015-06-26) *[[ZyXEL NBG6817 (Armor Z2)]] - AC2600 Dual-Band Wireless Gigabit Router :• FCC ID: I88NBG6817 (2016-09-14) *[[ZyXEL NBG6818 (Armor G1)]] - AC2600 Multi-Gigabit Security WiFi Router :• FCC ID: I88NBG6818 (2020-01-10) • [https://www.zyxel.com/products_services/AC2600-Multi-Gigabit-WiFi-Router-ARMOR-G1/ PPage] *[[ZyXEL NBG7815 (Armor G5)]] - AX6000 12-Stream Multi-Gigabit WiFi 6 Router :• FCC ID: I88NBG7815 (2020-04-07) • [https://www.zyxel.com/products_services/AX6000-12-Stream-Multi-Gigabit-WiFi-6-Router-ARMOR-G5// PPage] • [https://www.amazon.com/Zyxel-Armor-12-Stream-Multi-Gigabit-Router/dp/B08K3GCBJM Amazon]
